mailSubject: Updated Checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32)
mailBody:
Dear Surbhi,

Thank you for your email and for providing the updated checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC.

I have utilized the internal data to update the checklist as per your request. The revised checklist includes the latest information and highlights the status of various items. You can find the updated checklist stored in the JSON file at the following path: `kyc_json_store/K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32/checklist_info.json`.

If you have any further questions or need additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
Shubham
